product_name: MILK MAKEUPLip + Cheek Cream Blush Stick and Lip Color
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackMilk Makeup Lip + Cheek is a non-comedogenic cream blush + lip color with a nourishing formula that builds and blends seamlessly for a quick pop of color.
details: DetailsBenefitsMulti-use formula can be worn on both lips and cheeksCreamy, hydrating formula blends in seamlesslyGlides on smooth with no dragging, caking, or creasingBuilds up from natural to bold colorNon-comedogenic, so it won't clog poresPacks over 1,000+ swipes per stick, so you get tons of wear with less packagingAs easy to apply as swipe, blend, and go‚Äîno mirror requiredClinically proven to be non-irritating and non-sensitizingKey IngredientsMango butter, avocado oil, and apricot oil help nourish skin, boost hydration, and make the formula creamy and blendableFormulated WithoutParabensItem 2635023How To UseHow to Open: Twist product up half-an-inch with protective disk still on. Then gently twist disk off, don't flick or pull!Swipe the stick directly onto lips, cheeks, or both.Blend in with your fingertips, brush, or sponge.Build for more color payoff.Pair Lip + Cheek with Milk Makeup Sculpt Stick (sold separately) and Milk Makeup Matte Bronzer (sold separately) to complete your look.-Pro Tip: Before applying, warm stick directly on the back of your hand for an even more seamless application.IngredientsRicinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax, Candelilla Cera/Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Cire de Candelilla, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Isononyl Isononanoate, Silica, Fragrance (Parfum), Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Wax, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Isopropyl Myristate, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil/Huile V√©g√©tale Hydrog√©n√©e, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Sorbitan Tristearate, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Bis-stearyl Dimethicone, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Mica, Palmitic Acid, Limonene, Linalool, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: How to Open: Twist product up half-an-inch with protective disk still on. Then gently twist disk off, don't flick or pull!Swipe the stick directly onto lips, cheeks, or both.Blend in with your fingertips, brush, or sponge.Build for more color payoff.Pair Lip + Cheek with Milk Makeup Sculpt Stick (sold separately) and Milk Makeup Matte Bronzer (sold separately) to complete your look.-Pro Tip: Before applying, warm stick directly on the back of your hand for an even more seamless application.
ingredients: Candelilla Cera/Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Cire de Candelilla

reviews.headline: Best
reviews.comments:
This Is Literally The Best Blush
It Blends So Well With My Makeup
Very Pigmented
Looks Natural
I Got Color Werk

reviews.headline: Open and crash, used?
reviews.comments:
The most expensive product MILK brand was open and broken (cracked on its end)
I have the photo, I dont know if the responsible is ULTA or FEDEX

reviews.headline: insanely small for the price
reviews.comments: I don't care if I like the product or not, it's a sample size for the price. I have never seen anything this ridiculously small for this amount of money.

reviews.headline: What in the world!!!
reviews.comments: What the heck happened to the original size of this product!! The same price but super tiny!! Im very disappointed! Will never purchase this product again.

reviews.headline: No pigment
reviews.comments: My skin is very pale so it's easy to overdo it with blush. I bought the color Dash thinking I would get a nice light pink flush and I got nothing.  I've tried applying directly to my skin, applying on a damp beauty blender, then with my fingers. I can't get it to show up at all. It's super sheer on the back of my hand no matter how much I try to use. Big disappointment.

reviews.headline: The top took the entire top of the product iff
reviews.comments: I opened the top and all the product came off inside the top. The product was unusable.  Very disappointed as I prefer this style of blush.

reviews.headline: These are pretty good!!
reviews.comments: I like the shade range i just think theyre a little pricey for how much product you get

reviews.headline: Never tried light pink creamy and shiny only! 101#3.
reviews.comments: If you understand what you are using it is very right and very bright but sometimes it is not good to use all the time or constantly to as well but very nice a lot more nice as well and also than it is very hard to get on the first time as well b.

reviews.headline: Love This Product!
reviews.comments:
Always on the hunt for clean ingredients and would prefer it is made in the US or Europe.
This one passes the test.  It is very moisturizing and build able color, does not bother my oily skin, it gives a nice glow (I do use setting powder after).

reviews.headline: Wanted to love it
reviews.comments: Ive been looking for a red tone blush and enjoy the color I purchased. After trying for about a week, I'm still feeling like I haven't found a good way to apply without pulling my makeup underneath off. I also dont love the way it blends into my skin and think it has a, not strong but, funny smell

reviews.headline: Wanted to love it
reviews.comments: Ive been looking for a red tone blush and enjoy the color I purchased. After trying for about a week, I'm still feeling like I haven't found a good way to apply without pulling my makeup underneath off. I also dont love the way it blends into my skin and think it has a, not strong but, funny smell

reviews.headline: Beware of the size
reviews.comments: The product itself gives a subtle natural blush. However, when you purchase, you get a tiny sample size item. If you use for blush and lips, it will last you a couple of weeks at most. Wish that Ulta added a note of the size of the product to include in the description of the item.

reviews.headline: BUY IT!
reviews.comments: This is so worth it! To begin, it blends so well and has the perfect color to look natural. Also, it blends beautifully with a sponge or brush, or even your fingers!

reviews.headline: NO
reviews.comments: This product lost its scent leaving a crayon like smell within a couple months‚Ä¶Perhaps I don't use it enough. I wipe it down after every use but it still seemed to build up bacteria‚Ä¶?‚Ä¶every time I used it after the smell degraded I'd get a blemish or two‚Ä¶yuck

reviews.headline: Nice shade
reviews.comments: This stick worka great as a blush. Not so much as lip products as it clumps rather than spread. I put clear Kiko lip gloss over it and that worked better

reviews.headline: Would buy again
reviews.comments: this is a very beautiful color.. the product lasts forever, since you dont have to use as much to get pigment

reviews.headline: PLEASE STOP!!
reviews.comments: Got this, I would never recommend. I was disappointed Ulta is carrying this product.

reviews.headline: SOOOO GOOOOD
reviews.comments: I LOVE this product soo much and would repurchase i just wish there was more product in the container and i would recommend putting a powder blush to set it

reviews.headline: SOOOO GOOOOD

reviews.headline: Shade "Werk" and "rally"
reviews.comments: I loveeeee this blush i got it in a trio set for christmas with a highligter, blush, and another blush i loveee peach shade blushes and Werk is my perfect shade i love it soo much has the perfect amount of pigmentation! Defintely recommend! üíó

faceoff_positive.comments: I recently tried the Lip + Cheek Cream Blush Stick, and I must say I am impressed by this multi-tasking product. The product claims to provide a natural flush of color to both lips and cheeks, and it certainly delivered on that promise.I love the convenience of having a product that can be used on both my cheeks and lips, and the cream formula blends easily into the skin, giving a subtle yet buildable color. I have used this product on my bare skin and over foundation, and it works well in both scenarios.One thing I particularly like about this product is that it has a creamy, lightweight texture that feels comfortable on the skin, without feeling sticky or greasy. It also has a pleasant, subtle scent that is not overwhelming.The shade range of this product is also impressive, with a variety of hues that cater to different skin tones. I personally love the "Peachy" shade, which gives me a warm, natural-looking flush of color.Overall, I would highly recommend the Lip + Cheek Cream Blush Stick to anyone looking for a versatile, easy-to-use product that delivers a natural-looking flush of color to both lips and cheeks. It's a bit on the pricier side, but the quality of the product justifies the price in my opinion.Gifted by Milk Makeup
faceoff_positive.headline: A great product

faceoff_negative.comments: The product itself is so great - excellent pigmentation, buttery formula, blends perfectly. But the packaging is horrendously cheap. I have the lip and cheek stick, the bronzer stick, sculpt stick, and highlighter stick - this goes for all of them. When I received them, the tamper evident plastic cap on all of them took a huge chunk out of the product when removed. The turning mechanism at the bottom of the package that pushes up more product didn't work on two of the sticks that I received, and falls off of another one. It's hard to write this review because I love the product itself so much, but they really need to improve their packaging and invest in something higher quality. However, when I brought it the attention of the customer care team they issued me a refund which was greatly appreciated.
faceoff_negative.headline: Shoddy packaging
